sessions.description: ContextFlow integration and DevUI test prompt generation for workback planning tool discovery

interactions.description: Decision: Use ContextFlow DevUI sessions to capture real BizChat tool usage instead of relying on assumed tools from code analysis

details.decision: Use ContextFlow DevUI sessions to capture real BizChat tool usage instead of relying on assumed tools from code analysis
details.reasoning: Tool registry had 24 tools with 0 usage data. ContextFlow provides ground truth from actual BizChat sessions, enabling production-accurate training data and avoiding assumptions

accomplishments.description: Cloned ContextFlow repository from GitHub and explored architecture (Tauri app with 1055 objects)
Created integrate_contextflow_tools.py (418 lines) to extract tool usage from ContextFlow sessions
Analyzed 267 meetings from calendar data and generated test prompts for 10 workback planning meeting types (7 real, 3 synthetic)
Created comprehensive documentation: CONTEXTFLOW_INTEGRATION_GUIDE.md, DEVUI_TESTING_WORKFLOW.md, BIZCHAT_TEST_PROMPTS_CHECKLIST.md
Updated SilverFlow repository to latest version and confirmed existing meeting data quality (267 meetings, complete attendee metadata)
